summary: This is a brief email forwarding a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News. It is sent from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to several recipients, including defense attorney Jay Lefkowitz and former State Attorney Barry Krischer, indicating coordination or notification regarding media or legal matters related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jay Lefkowitz
persons.context: Primary recipient of an email forwarding a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News.

persons.name: Barry Krischer
persons.context: Copied on an email regarding a letter about Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News, related to his prior involvement in the case.

persons.name: Jack Alan Goldberger
persons.context: Copied on an email concerning a letter about Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney forwarded a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News on September 17, 2008.
The communication indicates ongoing legal or public relations activity related to the Epstein case in 2008.
Key legal figures including defense attorney Jay Lefkowitz and former prosecutor Barry Krischer were involved in this correspondence.
